entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12 except minus 16 inland.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 12 except minus 16 inland. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16 except minus 20 inland. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16 except minus 20 inland. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 26 December 2022
